Plot: A criminal subculture operates among U.S. soldiers stationed in West Germany just before the fall of the Berlin wall.
Title: Buffalo Soldiers
Writer: Robert O'Connor (book), Gregor Jordan (screenplay), Eric Weiss (screenplay), Nora Maccoby (screenplay)
Actors: Joaquin Phoenix, Ed Harris, Scott Glenn, Anna Paquin
tomatoConsensus: Overall, this caustic comedy hits more of its targets than it misses.
